title: I'VE FINALLY DONE IT!!!!!!
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/1mfn5y.jpg
I'M NEVER LEAVING LANE AGAIN!!!!!!
https://i.makeagif.com/media/4-19-2014/smMKyE.gif
WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

replies.body:
Haha congrats! I wonder how many lifetime stacks you have.

I used to hate losing to Nasus then I decided 'if you can't beat 'em, join 'em' and I've been crushing top lane ever since. Nasus doesn't snowball though, he's more like a glacier :>
Is it possible to see how many stacks Nasuses have after game, without checking replay? Something in the final screen, maybe?

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-03-31T16:50:28.962+0000)
>
> Nasuses

Nasi?
Nasusis?
Nasusus?
Nasees, nasasee, nasai, who knows
Nasopodes
dammit i was going to say that too :3

A flock of Nasi?
A gaggle of Nasi?
A herd of Nasi?
A pack of Nasi?
An ostentation of Nasi?
A romp of Nasi?
A labor of Nasi?
a stack of nasi
too good
How about Eons of Nasi?

Susans

:3
its nasi, octopus becomes octopi, nasUS, octopUS, NASI
I would love that, same with Vinergar, Sion, Cho

Could you make nasus stacks pingable? 

something like

"Nasus has 39 stacks by 40 minutes wow what a noob uninstall go back to mario"

I just Pick Soraka into him and rush {{item:3151}} + {{item:3165}}.

One pain in the ass deserves another, after all.

I was playing a match as Janna support(Was being pretty beastly too) our Nasus at the end of the game, had 823 stacks... This was I think a 52 minute game. It was so satisfying shield Nasus for almost 1500 health and watch as his 1 q just about one shot the tank. I have the match saved, it was one worthy of saving.
Dear god, that sounds epic

Well i was Not really this excited when i got Mastery 7 on Nasus
But well Done

You have, like, 12 champions at Mastery 7s.
It's not quite that exciting when you've got several.

> [{quoted}](name=Zarvanis,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-03-31T12:17:51.433+0000)
>
> You have, like, 12 champions at Mastery 7s.
> It's not quite that exciting when you've got several.

Well 20 if you count the others i have to upgrade as well but i don't have blue essence :(
https://media.tenor.co/images/2576121d401812048c4b8c97e67447c7/raw
I'm a simple man. I see "The Princess Bride", I upvote.
What happens if you reply to yourself?
u die a horrible death

Why are you looking at this post?
IT'S THREE MONTHS OLD??!!?!!?!
recent tab doesnt give a fuck how old a post is if it gets a comment it pops up
#PEOPLE ACTUALLY USE THE RECENT TAB?!??!?!?!?!!?!!!!

> [{quoted}](name=FeeNeeX,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-03-31T12:20:36.121+0000)
>
> Well 20 if you count the others i have to upgrade as well but i don't have blue essence :(

Just wondering.
Are you good at them, like lvl 7 good? I'm lvl 7 on 6 champs and suck at most of them aside Nasus because *cough* he's the easiest to play

> [{quoted}](name=le un le seul,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=0000000000000001,timestamp=2017-04-01T14:26:02.132+0000)
>
> Just wondering.
> Are you good at them, like lvl 7 good? I'm lvl 7 on 6 champs and suck at most of them aside Nasus because *cough* he's the easiest to play

Well it depends i dont play like challengers nor like a brozie so yeah am decent to very good to say the least
mastery 7 on Nasus for me personally was the easiest mastery 7 of all...try getting one on viktor or talon, that is so stupidly hard to achieve XD

Getting it on Illaoi is easier. 

You can get an S every other game.

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-03-31T13:36:03.238+0000)
>
> Getting it on Illaoi is easier. 
> 
> You can get an S every other game.

Because no one plays her hardly, lol. She's not Aatrox levels of memes but illaoi is pretty down there; I barely ever see her.

As an Illaoi main, I am 100% ok with it staying that way tbh.

People still play like they have no idea what she does.

YES! I honestly hope no one starts spamming her. She's one of those "No one sees, no one expects" type of Champions. Meanwhile, the enemy clenches their anus as they hug the tower for dear life cause the Lane is now the *The Cavern of SURPRISE TENTACLE SEX*
Personally, going against an Illaoi is a dream lane for me as a {{champion:27}} player. Haven't gone against one in {{item:3105}} .

It's been a long time since I last saw a decent Illaoi tbh.

Whenever I roam up to deal with her, I dodge nearly everything.  Sorry, but I do find it kinda funny when they miss everything and get rekt.  Kinda how other people feel when I'm Lux and I miss everything. xD

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=00010000000000000002,timestamp=2017-03-31T21:48:35.108+0000)
>
> It's been a long time since I last saw a decent Illaoi tbh.
> 
> Whenever I roam up to deal with her, I dodge nearly everything.  Sorry, but I do find it kinda funny when they miss everything and get rekt.  Kinda how other people feel when I'm Lux and I miss everything. xD

If you're roaming up to deal with her, you're probably ranged.

It's a lot harder for her to hit ranged people.

Also, you aren't getting minion blocked.

Try playing support.
No matter what you do, grades are determined by a D20. With an A+ on 15-20.
You need two 20's (crit confirm) to get an S.

I have literally gotten C's on games where I dragged my ADC's through hell to victory. And S's where I fed my ass off.
I find it's easier too grab some random stranger, duo-queue as ADC/support, and give *them* the S. I've gotten most of my chests that way. (>_>)
You think you have it tough? Try it on Jhin or Twitch. Took me fucking FOREVER to get those S's. My personal easiest are Camille and Kindred
Jhin is freaking hard because I never wanted to get a higher level than 4, but still wanted to play Jhin. ;--;
I sadest moment

> [{quoted}](name=Zed Bot Tacocat,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-31T13:31:35.917+0000)
>
> mastery 7 on Nasus for me personally was the easiest mastery 7 of all...try getting one on viktor or talon, that is so stupidly hard to achieve XD

Got the mastery 7 talon and its super easy :)

not really no, unless you can snowball harder than a draven but to do so you Need to win the laning phase and reach 6 at the same time. Talon builds strong on roaming and despite all his AoE potential goes strongly on single target offensives, and while it is an easy to roam with him thanks to his E once the 20 minute mark is passed it becomes nearly irrelevant for anything other than escapes or chases.
Talon is hard to achieve mastery 7 with because he falls off so hard as the game progresses that you could say an S is garuanteed impossible if you pass the 30 minute mark

> [{quoted}](name=Zed Bot Tacocat,realm=EUW,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=pX4beMPJ,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2017-03-31T15:27:32.303+0000)
>
> not really no, unless you can snowball harder than a draven but to do so you Need to win the laning phase and reach 6 at the same time. Talon builds strong on roaming and despite all his AoE potential goes strongly on single target offensives, and while it is an easy to roam with him thanks to his E once the 20 minute mark is passed it becomes nearly irrelevant for anything other than escapes or chases.
> Talon is hard to achieve mastery 7 with because he falls off so hard as the game progresses that you could say an S is garuanteed impossible if you pass the 30 minute mark

went 30/11 last game with him
Lost game cause zed wanted to feed them cuz i told him i want to win 

then i went back to http://i.imgur.com/O4G3HhO.gif again

Wait.. You can leave lane? How come no one told me!

I didn't know you could get stack from other lanes too!
Is Nasus a champion I really wanna learn? Like, I understand his potential, but isn't he kited fairly easily?

You need to think before you pick him
Who is on their team?
If you're first pick you should probably pick someone safer like Yorick or Sion
unless you are REALLY confident
you learn as you go mostly

Nasus is the 1st of my 8 mastery 7 champs. He sits with 110k sadly he is terrible right now. Games end in 20 min. If they dont youll get CCd to oblivion. Or adc buys mortal reminder and cuts you like butter...
I have mastery 7 144K exp on my main, Kog'Maw. Got Rammus mastery 7 in 48K exp. I didn't chose the m 7 Rammus life, the m 7 Rammus life chose me.
RIP Taunt Spam
